mapper.select: select * from (select b.id as zyzdlsh, (select value from sys_parameter sp where sp.code ='HOSP_INSURE_NATION_INFO' and sp.hosp_code=a.hosp_code limit 1) as yljgdm, a.profile_id as hzjgnwyid, b.visit_id as jzlsh, '3' as hzlxdm, a.name as xm, a.gender_code as xbdm, '' as xbmc, a.age as nl, c.type_code as zdlxqf, b.type_code as zdlb, b.crte_time as zdsj, c.code as zdbm, c.name as zdmc, 0 as zdsx, '' as zdsm, b.is_main as cyzdbz, '' as yzdbz, '1' as validflag, a.crte_time as appetime, a.crte_time as modifytime, a.crte_id as modifytcode, a.crte_name as modifytname from inpt_visit a join inpt_diagnose b on a.id =b.visit_id and a.hosp_code =b.hosp_code left join base_disease c on b.disease_id =c.id and b.hosp_code =c.hosp_code where b.crte_time >= date(#{startTime}) and b.crte_time <= date(#{endTime}) and a.hosp_code =#{hospCode} and b.hosp_code =#{hospCode} union all select b.id as zyzdlsh, (select value from sys_parameter sp where sp.code ='HOSP_INSURE_NATION_INFO' and sp.hosp_code=a.hosp_code limit 1) as yljgdm, a.profile_id as hzjgnwyid, b.visit_id as jzlsh, '1' as hzlxdm, a.name as xm, a.gender_code as xbdm, '' as xbmc, a.age as nl, c.type_code as zdlxqf, b.type_code as zdlb, b.crte_time as zdsj, c.code as zdbm, c.name as zdmc, 0 as zdsx, '' as zdsm, b.is_main as cyzdbz, '' as yzdbz, '1' as validflag, a.crte_time as appetime, a.crte_time as modifytime, a.crte_id as modifytcode, a.crte_name as modifytname from outpt_visit a join outpt_diagnose b on a.id =b.visit_id and a.hosp_code =b.hosp_code left join base_disease c on b.disease_id =c.id and b.hosp_code =c.hosp_code where b.crte_time >= date(#{startTime}) and b.crte_time <= date(#{endTime}) and a.hosp_code =#{hospCode} and b.hosp_code =#{hospCode} ) dd order by dd.appetime asc
